tool_description: Generates formatted financial reports combining multiple analytics results into professional presentation formats for stakeholders.

analytics_data_ids.description: Array of analytics result IDs to include in the report

report_format.description: Output format for the report: executive_summary, detailed, dashboard, regulatory

include_charts.description: Whether to include chart descriptions in the report

reporting_period.description: Reporting period for the financial report

target_audience.description: Target audience for the report: executives, operations, compliance, investors

include_recommendations.description: Whether to include strategic recommendations based on analysis

currency_display.description: Currency code for monetary value display

confidentiality_level.description: Confidentiality classification: public, internal, confidential, restricted

error_messages: Invalid analytics data IDs: One or more provided IDs do not reference valid analytics results.
Invalid report format: Use one of [executive_summary, detailed, dashboard, regulatory].
Invalid target audience: Use one of [executives, operations, compliance, investors].
Invalid currency display: Use valid 3-letter ISO 4217 currency code.
Invalid confidentiality level: Use one of [public, internal, confidential, restricted].
Missing required data: Report title and reporting period are required.
Data inconsistency: Analytics data from different time periods cannot be combined in a single report.
usage: Provide report_title, analytics_data_ids, and reporting_period, then configure format, audience, and presentation options to generate professional financial reports.

report_id.description: Unique identifier for the generated report

report_summary.description: Executive summary of key findings and metrics

key_metrics.description: List of key financial metrics and performance indicators

report_sections.description: List of report sections and their content summaries

recommendations.description: Strategic recommendations based on analysis (if enabled)

generation_timestamp.description: Timestamp when the report was generated
